name: Lotto ScratchORama - Big Win
description:
See how very LUCKY You Are!

You can't stop when you're getting winners and feeling the fun, the excitement and that special rush when you match 3 numbers and just keep on going ... and going.

You could be a million dollar winner!

Scratching is as easy as swiping with your finger
OR just using the super convenient INSTANT Scratch.

Five levels of play and many more themes to come.

Each level has different prizes.

Super easy to use when you're busy on the go or just killing time.

Play Lotto Scratch O Rama and get the full on experience of scratching lottery tickets right on your iPhone, iPod or iPad.

Play to Win with 5 different lottery scratch off ticket themes:

*** The Monte Carlo Itch ***
*** Zombie Scratch ***
*** Fortune Cookie ***
*** Racing Dollar Devils ***
*** The Lucky Shamrock Scratch ***
